name: World Congress On Chromatography
content: Meetings International proudly invites all the participants from all over the world to attend “World Congress on Chromatography” during October 25-26, 2018 at Rome, Italy. Chromatography 2018 will be operated by world class experts in the field of Chemistry, Modern Chemistry and Analytical Chemistry, workshops will also be organised to discuss the specific topics in the field of Chemistry like about latest Technologies, Trends about Chromatography and its application.
